author: Dmitri Safine [DDAY]
title: Graph DB Sidechain with Fluree
description: Off-chain DApp data storage options build silos that limit data's use across the ecosystem and lack comparable on-chain immutability/proof
solution: Build a provable, data-centric sidechain for DApps with Fluree immutable graph ledger/DB that leverages W3C semantic linked-data standards
experience:
Brian Platz: Data-centricity visionary and co-founder of Fluree  
Dmitri Safine: Sr. Data Engineer  
Michael Yagi: Sr. Software Engineer
